General.Name: Alphinat Inc
General.Description: Alphinat Inc. develops and markets software products that allow the implementation of self-service solutions and Web-based workspace. The company offers smart digital government solutions; revenue-generating solutions for telcos; SmartGuide, a civil portal for municipal solutions; dynamics customer portals; guided searches; and Lotus Notes migration applications. It also operates customer identity and access management and low-code development platforms. The company serves the public sector, as well as telecommunications, healthcare, and financial institutions in Canada, France, the United States, and internationally. Alphinat Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 2000 Peel Street, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3A 2W5
